long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Make 24 Game: Test Your Math Skills and Exercise Your Brain
Introduction
Make 24 is an engaging and educational card puzzle game that challenges players to use their math skills to solve puzzles and arrive at the number 24. The game is designed to exercise your brain, improve mental agility, and enhance your problem-solving abilities. With its simple rules, endless combinations, and competitive gameplay, Game of 24 offers a fun and rewarding experience for players of all ages.

Gameplay
In Make 24, players are dealt a set of four cards, each displaying a number. The objective is to use all four numbers and any combination of addition, subtraction, multiplication, and division operations to arrive at the number 24. Players must think quickly and strategically as they race against the clock to find a solution. The player who successfully solves the puzzle and reaches 24 earns a point, and the game continues with a new set of cards.

Extension Button Menu 
*Play more games and explore exciting themes on the page menu buttons.
